title: Mrs. Sarala's Saga...
description: A super caffeinated granny, with an obsession for football, screaming, “Football for life!” What’s new? Mrs. Sarala’s in town!Mrs. Sarala lives in Sanjaya nagar, with her best buddy- her football. Her heart, talent and passion all belong to the game of football. Her forgetfulness, coupled with her enthusiasm for life, lead her into a rollercoaster ride of adventures and misadventures.All her hilarious adventures, compiled into a hysterically- amusing book of Mrs. Sarala’s Saga…If you like Butter fingers this is a must read.
author: Aadya Kanchan
